CustomField.description: When selected, Plan Requirements can specify either a Program Plan or a parent Plan Requirement, but not both. For example, a Plan Requirement that has a parent Plan Requirement canâ€™t also specify a Program Plan, or vice versa. If you specify both a Program Plan and a parent Plan Requirement, an error message prevents saving until only one is selected.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When selected, Plan Requirements can specify either a Program Plan or a parent Plan Requirement, but not both. If you specify both a Program Plan and a parent Plan Requirement, an error message prevents saving until only one is selected.
CustomField.label: Validate Program Plan for Nested PR
